titleStmt.title: A proclamation commanding all seamen and mariners to repair to the ships on which they are listed
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II)
Charles II, King of England, 1630-1685.

notesStmt.note: "Given at our court at Whitehall the sixth day of April, 1673."
